subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees answered the Red Sox’ overwhelming bid for Daisuke Matsuzaka by submitting the highest proposal to talk exclusively with Kei Igawa, a left-hander from the Hanshin Tigers.
snippet: The Yankees answered the Red Sox’ overwhelming bid for Daisuke Matsuzaka by submitting the highest proposal to talk exclusively with Kei Igawa, a left-hander from the Hanshin Tigers.
